text:
e="preserve">Miguel Ángel Gutiérrez Machado (26 March 1960 – 29 December 2020) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003, he was Deputy of the Mexican Congress from Yucatán.
Gutiérrez Machado died at age 60 from COVID-19, during the pandemic in Mexico.
